snippet.title: The Actress: Hollywood Acting and the Female Star
snippet.description: This book investigates the contemporary film actress both as an artist and as an ideological construct. Divided into two sections, The Actress first examines the major issues in studying film acting, stardom, and the Hollywood actress.

snippet.title: Royal Portraits in Hollywood: Filming the Lives of Queens
snippet.description: In Royal Portraits in Hollywood: Filming the Lives of Queens, authors Elizabeth A. Ford and Deborah C. Mitchell follow the lives of historical queens as depicted on film from the 1930s to the present.
